alert.note: Alert for Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 24 at 3:28AM AKST until January 26 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions along with snow and blowing snow possible. Plan on difficult travel conditions. Damage to power lines is possible. Total snow accumulations of up to 3 inches are possible. * WHERE...Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning through late Tuesday night. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting as high as 60 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Storm Watch means there is potential for significant snow, sleet or ice accumulations that may impact travel. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.
